About me

I'm a robotics engineer with a strong interest in robotics and artificial intelligence. I've collaborated on projects that extend from mechanical design to neural networks, exploring a wide range of engineering disciplines. I'm excited by the potential of robotics and AI. It really is quite amazing what we can achieve when we design machines that can think, learn, and communicate with humans.

I combine technical expertise with creativity, observing breakthroughs and driving innovations in technology. I'm excited to make a contribution to a world in which machines interact with people organically understanding their needs, and speaking their language.
